solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Cori will be {cori_age_today} + {years_in_future} = <<{cori_age_today}+{years_in_future}={cori_age_in_5_years}>>{cori_age_in_5_years} years old.
In {years_in_future} years, Cori’s aunt will be {cori_age_in_5_years} x {aunt_age_multiple} = <<{cori_age_in_5_years}*{aunt_age_multiple}={aunt_age_in_5_years}>>{aunt_age_in_5_years} years old.
Today, her aunt is {aunt_age_in_5_years} - {years_in_future} = <<{aunt_age_in_5_years}-{years_in_future}={aunt_age_today}>>{aunt_age_today} years old.
